bundles.name: FIRST_HOME_BUYERS_PACKAGE_HOME_LOAN
bundles.description: We are here to help - with our First Home Buyer Package Home Loan and the addition of government support Schemes

features.additionalInfo: Your choice of Loan Saver Account or 100% Offset Account
Discounted interest rate for life of the loan
1% discount off the Mutual Visa Credit Card standard interest rate
No Annual Fee on Mutual Visa Credit Card
Annual Package Fee waived for first 12 months

eligibility.additionalInfo: Australian Citizens or permanent residents or as otherwise approved
Borrower must be minimum age of 18 years old
Borrower must be a natural person
Property to be purchased must be for owner occupation
Must be a first home buyer
Residential or Rural Lifestyle security up to 40 hectares
Loan purpose must be to purchase first home or construct first home

fees.name: AGENTS_COST
fees.additionalInfo: Not ascertainable, and payable to us or our solicitor or our or their agent

fees.name: CHEQUE_ISSUING_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable to us when a payment is made from your loan account by way of Financial Institution (FI) Cheque

fees.name: CONSENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Per consent. Payable to us when you ask us to consent to leasing, subdividing or any other dealing in relation to the security property

fees.name: DEFAULT_ADMINISTRATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable to us when the borrower (or security provider) has not performed an obligation on time including an obligation to pay money. This fee is payable monthly commencing one month after the obligation should have been performed and up to and including the month in which the obligation is performed. We debit this fees to tour loan account each month until the default is remedied.

fees.name: DISCHARGE_ADMINISTRATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable to us each time we release a security

fees.name: DISHONOUR_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable to us when a payment (such as as a direct debit, salary deduction or cheque) is dishonoured

fees.name: DUPLICATE_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Per copied document. Payable to us when we provide a copy of a document

fees.name: DUPLICATE_STATEMENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Per statement. Payable to us when we provide a copy of a statement

fees.name: INFORMATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: $1.00 per minute ($20.00 minimum fee). The fee will be calulated on the actual time spent retrieving and providing the information requested.Payable to us to provide information and that information is provided in writing

fees.name: LEGAL_FEES
fees.additionalInfo: Not ascertainable, payable to us on or before the settlement date and payable to us or our solicitor or our or their agent for preparing security documents

fees.name: LEGAL_FEES_(ADDITIONAL)
fees.additionalInfo: Not ascertainable, payable on or before the settlement data for addional Legal Fees for old, system Qualified or limited title security or for additional colateral security

fees.name: ONLINE_AGENCY_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Not ascertainable, these charges may vary depending on the type of enqury or transaction and payable to us whenever we are required to undertake stamping or electronic enquires or transcations on a security

fees.name: PACKAGE_HOME_LOAN_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable to receive Package Benefits

fees.name: PHOTOCOPYING_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Per sheet. Payable to use when we provide a photocopy of any document

fees.name: PRODUCTION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Per document per production. Payable to use if we produce a document to a land registry

fees.name: PROGRESS_PAYMENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Minimum $100 per progress payment on a building or construction loan. Payable whenever a progress payment is made on a building or construction loan.

fees.name: SETTLEMENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Per settlement. Payable to us each time we or our solicitor attend settlement in connection with a security

fees.name: TITLE_SEARCH_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Not Ascertainable, payable to us to us or our solicitor or our or their agent on or before the settlement date

fees.name: VALUATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Valuation fees are available upon enquiry and payable in relation to each property to which a loan is secured

fees.name: VALUATION_FEE_(PROGESS_VALUATION)
fees.additionalInfo: Progress Valuation fees are available upon enquiry and payable in relation to each property to which a loan is secured

data.name: First Home Buyer Package Home Loan
data.description: We are here to help - with our First Home Buyer Package Home Loan and the addition of government support schemes
